thread.title: 5 Hot Refiners Hit New Highs On Expanding Margins
thread.title_full: 5 Hot Refiners Hit New Highs On Expanding Margins

title: 5 Hot Refiners Hit New Highs On Expanding Margins
text:
Corn Forecasts Raised, Which Shocks Investors 
Corn futures fell to a seven-week low and soybeans plunged the most in six years after the U.S. unexpectedly raised its crop forecasts, citing higher yields than anticipated. The corn harvest will be 13.686 billion bushels compared with 13.53 billion projected in July, the Agriculture Department ... 08/12/2015 05:51 PM ET Stocks End With Solid Gains; Apple, Caterpillar Pump Up The Dow 
Major averages kicked off the week in fine fashion Monday, ending with solid gains. Commodity stocks outperformed thanks to a big rally in China stocks overnight. The Dow Jones industrial average outperformed, rising 1.4%, led by Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) and Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL). Apple got a lift ... 08/10/2015 04:19 PM ET Stocks Hold Gains; Oil Rises And Energy Stocks Lead 
Stocks held morning gains going into the noon hour Monday with big caps in the Dow Jones industrial average leading the way, thanks, in part, to higher oil prices. The Dow gained 1.2%, the S&P 500 rose 1.1% and the Nasdaq gained 1% in the stock market today. Volume was mixed with the NYSE ... 08/10/2015 11:55 AM ET Gas Shock: L.A. Drivers Are Paying Record 50% Premium 
California's gas-price spike appears to be having a negative impact on already-shaky consumer sentiment nationwide. The latest IBD/TIPP Economic Optimism Index fell 1.2 points to 46.9, the lowest since November, led by a 15.4% drop in the West. California's reading was 45.2. Readings below 50 ... 08/04/2015 05:32 PM ET Indexes Rumble Higher, Shifting Outlook Back To Uptrend 
Stocks scored gains Thursday for the fifth time in six sessions as the bulls showed confidence. The Nasdaq popped 1.3%, while the S&P 500 added 0.8%. The IBD 50 advanced 0.9%. Volume in the stock market rose on the Nasdaq but slipped on the NYSE. The Nasdaq's recent gains include two gap-up ... 07/16/2015 07:06 PM ET Skechers, Nike Top No. 1 Apparel Sector 
Apparel stocks are riding high in the thick of back-to-school shopping season. The sector ranked No. 1, while two subgroups — shoes and clothing manufacturers — ranked Nos. 1 and 23, respectively, among the 197 industry groups in Wednesday's IBD. The National Retail Federation actually ... 08/12/2015 05:35 PM ET Consumer, Medical Groups Dominate 2015 Stock Performance 
Past the midway point of 2015, the S&P 500 is clinging to just a small gain. Trading has been choppy and lacking sustained rallies, but some segments of the market have still managed to thrive. Among IBD's 197 industry groups, 18 are up 20% or more year to date. Strength has been concentrated ... 08/11/2015 06:23 PM ET Twitter Scores On Expanded Deal With The NFL 
Twitter's stock rose Monday after the microblog got upgraded by investment bank Monness Crespi Hardt, and the company announced an expanded pact with the National Football League. Monness Crespi upgraded Twitter stock to buy from neutral but maintained its price target of 35. Twitter (NYSE:TWTR) ... 08/10/2015 06:48 PM ET Cost Of Shipping Iron Ore Soars In Past Month 
The cost of hiring a ship to haul iron ore more than doubled in the last month amid speculation that China is adding to stockpiles while the global vessel fleet shrinks. Rates for Capesizes, the vessels that dominate the ore trade, were at $18,250 a day as of Friday, compared with $8,369 a month ... 08/07/2015 06:12 PM ET IT Consultants Seeing Robust Demand 
A number of IT consulting firms have noted robust demand in all industries and markets served. In a recent report, S&P Capital IQ gave the IT consulting and services provider sub-industry group a neutral rating.
